message.msgstr: On this page, you may restore several device configuration.
If you restore the default configuration, your private configuration will be lost. You sure you want to restore the default configuration?
On this page, you may restore all device configuration.
There was a problem with the request.
On this page, you can reboot the device by clicking the button below.
It takes some time to reboot the device, and Web-based network management system will automatically disconnect. Please log in again later! Sure you want to reboot the device?
DO you confirm reset the account of web? the account of web will be restore to the default value if you confirm.
On this page, you can reset the account of web to the default value.
System is rebooting... Please wait for a moment and relogin after reboot.
On this page, you may reset several device configuration.
If you reset the default configuration, your private configuration will be lost. You sure you want to reset the default configuration?

On this page, you can set the indicator switch of a device. You can configure an indicator off period if you set indicator switch to Off. An indicator is always off if you do not specify an indicator off period.
